swipe_text: Swipe left/right on this area to change slide
aboute_gallery_shortText:
The gallery was created as a recruitment task.

It was written using the Vue + webpack. Uses images from unsplash.

Used libraries:
used_library:
• Vue.js, Vue - Reute, Vue - Store, Vue - Vuex, I18n
  • Sass
  • Bootstrap
  • axios.js for Vue
  • TweenMax.js for Vue
